text: @JoeBiden The CDC will be leading the fight against the coronavirus. POTUS will have an indirect leadership role in this battle and I thank God, which the Communistocrats don’t believe exists, that Trump is our president.

entity.name: US CDC orders 14-day quarantine for the 195 Americans evacuated from China
entity.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) imposed a federal quarantine to protect "their families and communities" as evacuees are monitored for coronavirus symptoms at March Air Reserve Base in Riverside, California. According to the CDC, the last federal quarantine was in the 1960s to contain the smallpox virus.
